personalInfo.name: Thomas
personalInfo.myDescription: I'm a passionate web-developer and content creator. My affinity is for back-end development and database design, however have spent the majority of my time working on front-end projects. Websites with beautiful UI/UX, and efficient back-end design, are the future that has already arrived.

degrees.name: CFA Level 2 Candidate
itemList: Passed the level 1 CFA exam in December 2017, Sydney.

responsabilities: Creating and maintaining scalable infrastructure leveraging modern AWS products
Planned post content strategy and timeline.
Contributed to writing posts and photoraphy.
Receive ideas from customer through an awesome communicator, discuss with the whole team to find the best solution for each huge feature.
Setup a large part of AWS servers and services, together with another seniors.
Receive ideas from customer, discuss with customer through a Vietnamese project manager to put the first step in all researching and developing phases.
Giving advices to customer and team about pricing of running services.
Design, implement some parts of system's layout based on customers' ideas and instructions.
Connect all team members with all types of interest, help new members get along with old members in just a few days.

interests.title: About Me
interests.firstBlock: Apart from web development and technology, my interests include reading (philosophy, psychology and history), travelling (predominanetly to historical locations in Asia), and playing soccer (footbal).
interests.secondBlock: While I'm procrastinating, I'm usually watching hours of history and war documentaries on YouTube. I also like to meditate, and have completed three 10-day meditation retreats since 2014. I consider this to be a cornerstone of my self-development and believe the world would be a better place if everyone sat at least one 10-day retreat in their lives.
